Benchmark

Definition of two suites of benchmark Problems can be found in papers:

  • Pesudo-Boolean problems (PBO) : Benchmarking discrete optimization heuristics with IOHprofiler
  • Black-Box Optimization Benchmarking (BBOB) : Real-Parameter Black-Box Optimization Benchmarking2010: Presentation of the Noiseless Functions

The implementation of testing algorithms can be found in the repository https://github.com/IOHprofiler/IOHalgorithm.

For details:

  • Problems
  • Transformation
